examples.example: 不管你在哪儿，我都会一直默默支持你。

translate.english: No matter where you are, I will always support you silently.

examples.example: 无论你在哪儿遇到困难，都不要害怕，总有人会来帮助你。

translate.english: No matter where you encounter difficulties, don't be afraid, there will always be someone who will come to help you.

examples.example: 无论你将来走到哪儿，都要保持乐观向上的心态。

translate.english: No matter where you go in the future, always keep an optimistic and positive attitude.
